subject: re:Can't afford medications you need?
body:
Dear customer.
FDA warns that the number of underground Web pharmacies selling low-quality medications is growing. Luckily, there are still some Internet drugstores that we can rely on.
Caring for oneself is a natural quality of a human being. Don't get too risky buying medications from unlicensed Web pharmacies can be dangerous. If you want to save on your drugs try CanadianPharmacy. The prices in our discount Canadian drugstore will please you. CanadianPharmacy welcomes you.
CanadianPharmacy the best that modern medicine can offer you, plus the best Canadian prices.
Yours faithfully,Beth Leonard
